title: Allow access to binary data of Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Media.Song class
body: The MediaPlayer class can play Song objects, but there is currently no way to get at the song data. Allow binary access would allow custom vizualizations, media players, and audio enabled games.

comments.body: Don't see an edit idea button, so want to add that it would help with this request as well: http://wpdev.uservoice.com/forums/110705-app-platform/suggestions/1866163-better-audio-apis-for-musician-apps-tools
